title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Mix eggs and cheese. Cook bacon. Combine all with spaghetti and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken. Grill until tender. Prepare gravy with tomato sauce, cream, and spices. Add chicken to gravy and simmer.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and easy stir fry with fresh vegetables and savory sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add garlic and ginger. Stir fry vegetables. Add soy sauce and mix well.
